Fuming Cloud.name: Fuming Cloud
Fuming Cloud.flavor: You scour your foes with the breath of the volcano.
Fuming Cloud.effect: Choose one ally within 5 squares of you. The target is marked by that ally until the end of your next turn.

Magma Fissures.name: Magma Fissures
Magma Fissures.flavor: Jagged fissures full of spouting lava surround your ally, searing your foes and trapping them close to that ally.
Magma Fissures.range: Area burst 2 within 10 centered on one of your allies
Magma Fissures.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier fire and thunder damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Magma Fissures.effect: The burst creates a zone centered on your ally that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone moves with your ally. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies, and enemies within the zone that move away from your ally on their turn take 2d10 fire damage and are slowed until the end of their next turn.

Blasted Ground.name: Blasted Ground
Blasted Ground.flavor: You call up broken, red-hot rubble from below the ground in a wide circle around you, creating a formidable obstacle.
Blasted Ground.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. Any enemy that ends its turn within the zone or that falls prone within the zone takes 1d10 fire damage.
